mapper.insert: insert into member (memberid, idx, pwd, name, email, phone, addr1, addr2, post, birth, gender, fileSize, recordPicName, regDate, lastDate, pwDate, status) values(#{memberid}, member_seq.nextval, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{post}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{fileSize}, #{recordPicName}, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, default)
